name: HOOKED (jaggerdane)
description:
Combining precise platforming and fast-paced enemy encounters, HOOKED is a first-person 3D platformer that pits the main character, Budd, against an environment of baddies, equipped with nothing but his trusty grappling hook. Traverse the perilous mysteries of space and discover new ways to progress while picking up gems along the way!

The red marks are anchor points Budd's grappling hook can attach to. When attached to an anchor point, Return the hook early for a boost in velocity!

*Final Project for Game Development 2*

Controls:

WASD - Move

SHIFT - Sprint

SPACE - Jump

Hold LEFTMOUSE - Send hook

Release LEFTMOUSE - Return hook

Credits:

Tristan Hoffay - Programming, Music, Art Design

Anoosh Kapadia - Programming, Art Design

Brandon Nosaka - Level Design

Daphney Rubio - Level Design

Jagger Verdugo - Producer, Programming, Level Design
